pages.title: Mob Spawning
pages.text: Inside Vaults, Mobs will $(#033dfc)randomly spawn$() if the Vault doesnt have a modifier (like Peaceful) that negates this.$(br)By default, each $(#033dfc)Vault$() has $(#033dfc)+2$() Mob Spawns, making Mobs $(#033dfc)constantly spawn$() around Players

pages.title: Vault Spawners
pages.text: Mobs can also spawn in groups from $(#033dfc)Vault Spawners$(), which will constantly spawn mobs $(#033dfc)without limit$() until broken by a Player, having a chance to drop $(#033dfc)Cage dust$(), a crafting Ingredient for the $(#033dfc)Survival Spawner$().
